titleStmt.title: A dyet for the Christian soule, constantly to be obserued euery day, that it may alwaies reioyce in the Lord..

notesStmt.note: Title within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 193), printers' device on t.p. (McK. 271), text pages have ornamental borders.
Numerous errors in paging: pagings repeated, and out of order.
Bound and filmed with STC (2nd ed.) 1041.3 "A looking glasse of mortalitie" preceding, and with STC 18163 "The true knowledge of a mans owne selfe" following.
Imperfect: tightly bound; A₂, A₆₋₇, A₁₁₋₁₂, B₁₋₂, all after B₈ lacking.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.
